snippet: When the Spurs traveled to Utah earlier this week to put their 11-game winning streak on the line, Coach Gregg Popovich left the aging stars Tim Duncan, Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili at home.
abstract: When the Spurs traveled to Utah earlier this week to put their 11-game winning streak on the line, Coach Gregg Popovich left the aging stars Tim Duncan, Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili at home.

headline.main: In Tight Race for Top Spot, Spurs Coach Prefers to Rest Aging Stars
